title: joke3579的工作陈列
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:simple-yonder]]
[[module css]]

/* -------------------- 板式 -------------------- */

div#header h1 a span,
div#header h2 span{
    display: none;
}

div#header h1 a:after {
    content: "文件已归档";
    display: block;
}
div#header h2:after {
    content: "点击上方以返回首页";
    display: block;
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #f4f4f4;
    padding: 14px 0;
    white-space: pre;
}

/* Rating Bar */
.page-rate-widget-box {
    padding-bottom: 3px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #7e2520;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 0;
}

/* Tab List */
ul.yui-nav {
    padding-bottom: 3px;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a em{
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px transparent;
}

/* -------------------- 杂项 -------------------- */

a:visited{
color: #7e2520;
}

/* 4461的 */
.pinkle {
color:#02861C;
background-color: #FBFBEF;
}

/* 在折叠前后加入装饰性标识 */
.collapsible-block .collapsible-block-folded a:before {
    content: "▽ "
}
.collapsible-block .collapsible-block-folded a:after {
    content: " ▽"
}
.collapsible-block .collapsible-block-unfolded .collapsible-block-unfolded-link a:before {
    content: "▼ "
}
.collapsible-block .collapsible-block-unfolded .collapsible-block-unfolded-link a:after {
    content: " ▼"
}

/* 更改折叠头部视觉体现 */
div:not(.specla) > .collapsible-block > .collapsible-block-folded,
div:not(.specla) > .collapsible-block > .collapsible-block-unfolded > .collapsible-block-unfolded-link{
    font-size: 125%;
    color: #7e2520;
    font-weight:bold;
    text-align:center;
}
div.specla > .collapsible-block > .collapsible-block-folded > a,
div.specla > .collapsible-block > .collapsible-block-unfolded > .collapsible-block-unfolded-link > a {
    font-size: 180%;
    color: #7e2520;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: center;
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
}
div:not(.specla) > .collapsible-block > .collapsible-block-folded > a:hover,
div:not(.specla) > .collapsible-block > .collapsible-block-unfolded > .collapsible-block-unfolded-link > a:hover,
div.specla > .collapsible-block > .collapsible-block-folded > a:hover,
div.specla > .collapsible-block > .collapsible-block-unfolded > .collapsible-block-unfolded-link > a:hover {
    text-decoration:none;
}

/* 更改折叠内元素视觉体现 */
.collapsible-block .collapsible-block-unfolded .collapsible-block-content {
    display: block;
    border-left: 5px solid #7e2520;
    padding: 0px 5px 0px 5px;
    margin: 0px 3px 1.5em 3px;
}

.collapsible-block .parpage{
    font-size: 120%;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    border-right: 5px solid #7e2520;
}

/* tab动画 */
.yui-navset .yui-content {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: none;
  padding: 0;
  position: relative;
  margin-top: 0.2em;
  transform-origin: 0 0;
}
.yui-navset .yui-content > div {
  border: 1px solid var(--border-colour);
  border-left: none;
  background-color: #f5f5f5;
  padding: 0.25em 0.5em;
  display: block;
  top: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  transform-origin: 0 0;
}
#page-content .yui-navset .yui-content > div > * {
  transform-origin: 0 0;
}
#page-content .yui-navset .yui-content > div[style*="none"] {
  display: block !important;
  flex: 0;
  max-height: 0;
  padding: 0 0.5em;
  border-width: 0;
  /* The following transition affects the one that DISAPPEARS */
  transition: padding 0s linear 0.5s,
        border-width 0s linear 0.5s,
        flex 0.5s cubic-bezier(.0,1.27,.0,.89) 0s;
  animation: tab-disappear 0.5s ease-in-out 0s 1 both;
}
#page-content .yui-navset .yui-content > div[style*="block"] {
  display: block !important;
  flex: 1;
  max-height: 9999rem;
  /* The following transition affects the one that APPEARS */
  transition: padding 0s linear 0.5s,
        border-width 0s linear 0.5s,
        flex 0.5s cubic-bezier(.99,.0,.99,.0) 0.5s;
  animation: tab-appear 0.5s ease-in-out 0.5s 1 both;
}
 
@keyframes tab-disappear {
  0% { max-height: 9999rem; }
  1% { max-height: 100vh; }
  100% { max-height: 0; }
}
@keyframes tab-appear {
  0% { max-height: 0; }
  99% { max-height: 100vh; }
  100% { max-height: 9999rem; }
}

/* -------------------- 字数显示 -------------------- */

.hover {
   color: #7e2520;
   text-decoration: underline;
   font-size: 190%;
   font-family: 'jostregular', '黑体';
}
.hover .hover-text {
   position: absolute;
   right: 180px;
   display: none;
   margin: 23px 0px;
   font-size: 120%;
   height: auto;
   width: auto;
   background: white;
   border: 1px solid black;
   color: black;
   padding: 0.4em;
}

.hover:hover {
   text-decoration: none;
   border-bottom: none;
   display: block;
   color: #7e2520;
}
.hover:hover .hover-text {
   display: inline;
   font-size: 80%;
}

[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[tabview]]

[[tab 一些东西]]
[[=]]
++ 大概是退站宣言(?)啥的吧
[[/=]]

写于 10 Aug 2021。

该从何说起呢……没什么话可说就先介绍自己的情况吧（拍手）

06年生人，今年刚满15岁。是河北人，竞争十分激烈（哭），于是要去衡水上高中。八月下旬开始军训。确实没有什么时间进行翻译活动了，在这里致歉。然而，不进行翻译活动并不代表我会就此离开。如有时间，我会回来看看的。

号不会删除，如无意外三年后仍会继续进行翻译。

许多翻译新星冉冉升起啊……真好。

？怎么一年了
虽然但是仍然没有时间 所以先摆着

？怎么快两年了
大概可能有点时间了 但是先摆着
